body_html:
Yup, that's a reasonable solution too, and something that could be done pretty quickly.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu#L92 Can you try editing that to add 6.0,6.1 and see if the immediate problem gets resolved? (Feel free to send us a PR if so).

In the meantime, we'd like to make this also available for our non-docker folks, so we'll also work on that if we can.

body:
Yup, that's a reasonable solution too, and something that could be done pretty quickly.  

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/docker/Dockerfile.devel-gpu#L92  Can you try editing that to add 6.0,6.1 and see if the immediate problem gets resolved?  (Feel free to send us a PR if so).

In the meantime, we'd like to make this also available for our non-docker folks, so we'll also work on that if we can.
